lines.text: I never realized what a spunky devil you are.
I don't know why he puts up with her. If she were mine, I'd cut off her nose.
Watch he'll say something like "So gentlemen, we meet again".

FRUITCAKE? FRUITCAKE? Listen Bucko, I happen to be a highly educated, intelligent girl with an I.Q. that would put you pea-brain in the cellar. So remember, If it weren't for me, you wouldn't be here. Call me for dinner.

[Max and Leo are tied down in the desert]
Max. I just want you to know... that I blame *you* for this.

[Max and Leo are escaping the desert after Max breaks a bottle of water to cut his bindings]
The only bottle of water for two hundred miles and you had to break it.

[Max, Leo, and Patricia are dressing in holy attire on a train]
If you're trying to make a pass at me, Max... I hardly think we're dressed for the occasion.
Thank you, Tall Eagle. Good night, Coyote.
